text: Lars Vilks (20 June 1946 â€“ 3 October 2021) was a Swedish artist. He was best known for his mock drawings of the prophet Mohammed. Vilks was born in Helsingborg, Sweden. Vilks died in a car accident on 3 October 2021 in Markaryd, Sweden at the age of 75. ==References== == Other websites == Category:1946 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Swedish artists Category:Road accident deaths Category:People from Helsingborg Category:20th- century artists Category:21st-century artists
